cab.content: (P 8927) From Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, 7275 1M December 1920. (Received 20th, 10 a.m.) . * Priority A. 144-7 S; Secret. Afghanistan. ' Mahraud Tarsi,; in reply^to^tefegraphic. :message:from Afghan Envoy, sent in advance of my letter, has telegraphed to him that itwould be (? difficult to) fix up arrangements for Mission before 5th January, on which date Mission will be awaited on Frontier.
